title: Ambient Earth Nature Loops
description: This natural selection of seamless loops is a subset of our Nature’s Soundscapes sound library. Particularly suited for games, multi-layer environments and backgrounds.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

The Ambient Earth Nature Loops sound FX collection includes traditional and alternative points of view on the sounds of wind, water, rain, thunder, forests, mountains, and nighttime. The collection is a fantastic complement to any sound designer needing to recreate organic environments or soundscapes. 


You may Also Be Interested In:

Fantasy Game

Hybrid Game Sounds

Sci-Fi Worlds Universe

Game Makers Sound Effects Kit


All files inside Ambient Earth Nature Loops loop seamlessly. Most loops are 45-60 seconds in duration and can be played for as long as you need them to. This nature ambience loop library showcases sound effects from all across the beautiful rolling hills of Tennessee, countryside of New York, The Rocky & Smokey Mountains. After 1 year of recording different locations with the aim of creating a valuable resource for game nature loops, we present to you this ultra affordable and versatile library. 


All of the organic and lightly edited field recordings are delivered in 44.1kHz/16bit .WAV file format. That’s the quality you need to maintain a top-notch level of clarity and expression when sound editing, pitch shifting, and effects processing.

The awesome power of nature is in your mix and you’ll be in total control with these beautifully captured sounds. Impress your audience with the grand auditory experiences you can create with the Ambient Earth Nature Loops – sound effects library.
technicalDetails:
• 1.45 GB of audio samples
  • 135 game ready nature ambience loops
  • All in 44.1k/16bit .wav files
  • Designed for games, film, tv, video, motion graphics & more
  • The go to sound pack for nature loops for game developers
  • Perfect for any natural environment
  • 129 minutes of background nature sounds
  • 16 forest ambience loops - calm country day, insects, cicadas, forest frogs
  • 10 mountain nature loops from the Great Smokey Mountains - summer wildlife, day, birds, insects
  • 17 nighttime loops - rural, country, summer, fall - recorded in Tennessee
  • 15 ocean & wave nature loops - distant, close, heavy, ripples on the pier & more. All recorded in New York.
  • 34 rain & thunder loops like soft, light, steady, medium, thunder rumble & more
  • 21 water sources & stream loops - creek in the rocky mountains, rivers, water flows & more
  • 8 suburban nature loops - summer morning, fall evening & summer Tennessee birds
  • 14 wind background loops - distant steady air, Rocky Mountain Cave, underground cavern, cold winter wind & more
  • All files are game-ready, mastered and optimized in length, size to reduce game distributions and space.

Number of Audio Waves: 135

Number of Audio Cues: 135

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 129

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
